project_id.description: The unique identifier for the project.

client_id.description: The unique identifier for the client associated with this project.

client_name.description: The name of the client associated with this project.

total_hours.description: The total number of hours spent on this project.

billable_hours.description: The number of billable hours spent on this project.

currency.description: The currency in which the billable amount is specified.

billable_amount.description: The total amount that can be billed for this project in the given currency.

from.description: The start date for the project time frame.

to.description: The end date for the project time frame.
